clues.text: Ictinus & Callicrates, architects & possible rivals, began constructing this Athenian temple around 447 B.C.

Author of "De Architectura", this man would inspire a famous drawing by Leonardo Da Vinci

clues.text: You don't want a diagnosis of CUP, this of unknown primary; fortunately, it's rare

rounds.text: Continuing his tradition of vetoes as a mayor & as a governor, he trails only FDR in total vetoes as president
